review: Not impressed with the new feature. It's not user-friendly.
replyContent: We appreciate your feedback. Please try again periodically, ensuring your internet connection is stable and you're using the latest version of the BANKApp app. If everything is fine, we would appreciate a 5-star rating from you. Thanks~Asri

review: Disappointed with the lack of updates. It's been months since the last update.
replyContent: Sorry to hear that. We'll look into it and provide a solution as soon as possible. If everything is fine, we would appreciate a 5-star rating from you. Thanks~Belin

review: Frustrated with the poor customer service. It took too long to resolve my issue.
replyContent: We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please provide more details of the problem through BANK's official WhatsApp at 08121214017 or email BANKApp@BANK.co.id. If everything is fine, we would appreciate a 5-star rating from you. Thanks~Erza
